parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate or party.  It discusses the actions of the Craiova City Hall and the local police regarding outdoor commerce.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content is intended to reach a wide audience, not just specific individuals.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections. The content focuses on a local issue concerning commerce and the actions of local authorities. There is no mention of any candidate or party, nor any call to action related to voting.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of citizen journalism, reporting on a local event. It presents information about a local issue, without explicitly advocating for or against any political candidate or party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses an opinion on the actions of the local authorities, it does not express a personal opinion unrelated to the political process. The opinion is directly related to a local governance issue.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>901792818723768</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while expressing an opinion on a local governance issue, does not constitute electoral propaganda. It does not meet the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post does not directly refer to any parliamentary candidate or party, its objective is not to influence the vote, and it does not exceed the limits of journalistic reporting on a local event. The fact that it is a paid advertisement does not automatically make it electoral propaganda; the content itself must meet the legal criteria for such classification.  The image depicts a scene of outdoor commerce and does not contain any political messaging.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>SC INDISCRET MEDIA SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
